name: Long, Appellant, v. Monongahela City School District
name_abbreviation: Long v. Monongahela City School District

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and McBride, JJ.
parties: Long, Appellant, v. Monongahela City School District.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of the Court below appearing in 16 Pa. D. & C. 2d 790.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Paul A. Simmons, with him Palmer J. McCloslcey, Jr., for appellants.
James G. McOreight, with him William II. Robinson, and McCreight & McCreight, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Long, Appellant, v. Monongahela City School District.
Argued March 20, 1959.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and McBride, JJ.
Paul A. Simmons, with him Palmer J. McCloslcey, Jr., for appellants.
James G. McOreight, with him William II. Robinson, and McCreight & McCreight, for appellee.
May 28, 1959:
